chapters.name: Level 1. Where the hell, am I?
chapters.description:
MC appeared in the different world after accident happend. 

Was introduced to system and forced to pick human race. 

For appeareance he picked his previous appearance at age of 11. 

After finishing, progress was automatically saved by system

chapters.name: Level 2. Magnus... just Magnus
chapters.description:
Talked with hagrid. First time used inventory. Got all mandatory first year items. 

First time 'USED' book and got 'Alchemy' skill. 

Also accidently got 'Sneak' and 'Speech' skills.

Due to that got a level up.

chapters.name: Level 3[p1]. Magic, Stamina or Health?
chapters.description:
Got to the Great Hall. Argued with system about Races choices.

Got buff from a system to speech to get through initial stages. Saved after getting through.

Got into Gryffindor after using same method as Harry Potter, saying not Slytherin

abilities.name: Strong argument
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
Your words and sentences hold more weight. People listening to you, with higher probability will trust you. Higher chance to win in verbal arguments.

abilities.name: Weak Presence
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 1.
Your presence is now harder to notice, and some people would even ignore you completely as if you are not there at all, unless you proactively attract attention to yourself.

abilities.name: Focused mind
abilities.description:
Alchemy ability
Tier 1.
Becomes easier to concentrate and focus your attention during alchemical activities. Harder for external forces to distract you from those activities

chapters.name: Level 3[p2]. Character point? Skill point?
chapters.description:
Reached Gryffindor tower.

Leveled up. Found out what health, magicka and stamina are responsible for. Decided to invest in magicka.

Accessed skills menu.Looked at 3 possible abilities but did not pick any for now.

chapters.name: Level 3[p3]. Bathrooms? Schedule? And who am I actually?
chapters.description:
Woke up. Looked for bathroom. Read a book. 

Talked with granger and told her previously thought up background story.

My story touched her and raised my speech. Mainly thanks to the buff.

chapters.name: Level 3[p4]. Where the heck am I going?
chapters.description:
Had a talk with Granger. Learned when buff ends. Went to breakfast. Got schedule. 

Asked senior, Oliver Wood, to show us the way to library. He also showed path to bathrooms.

Read books in library. Went to first lesson, history. Got new level up.

abilities.name: Strong argument 1/4 (25)
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
Your words and sentences hold more weight. People listening to you, with higher probability will trust you. Higher chance to win in verbal arguments.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Weak Presence 0/5
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 1.
Your presence is now harder to notice, and some people would even ignore you completely as if you are not there at all, unless you proactively attract attention to yourself.

abilities.name: Focused mind
abilities.description:
Alchemy ability
Tier 1.
Becomes easier to concentrate and focus your attention during alchemical activities. Harder for external forces to distract you from those activities

abilities.name: Remarkable Comprehension 1/3 (30)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension goes easier and much faster. It helps acquire more knowledge in less time.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Fast Reading 1/2 (65)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
You read books very fast, close to what subvocalization limit is without losing comprehension. 
Note: Comprehension here is not information comprehension, but comprehension of words you’ve read.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better memory 1/3 (45)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
Improves your memory in both memorizing and recalling capabilities.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better concentration 1/2 (45)
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 1
Increase in concentration during any use of magic. Helps in casting magic and focusing power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Gestures 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Gestures ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using gestures. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without gestures subconsciously.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Empowering
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 2
Great knowledge of theory allows you to make magic you wield increase or decrease in effect, masterfully controlling amount of magic you channel for it. Degree of change in the amount depends on Magic Theory level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

spells.name: Fire-Making Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Incendio
Charm
Sets item on fire
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Mending Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

chapters.name: Level 9. New abilities and library books
chapters.description:

Got a lot of spells and skill levels from them. 

For the first time deleted 2 saves.

chapters.name: Level 13[p1]. Troll attack
chapters.description:
Halloween came.

Got closer to Hermione, after she cried and we had a good talk. 

Troll attacked, but I saved golden trio and was able to practice my strength on the troll.
Got closer to golden trio

Got Gryffindor 5 points after attack and got noticed by teachers.

chapters.name: Level 13[p2]. New skills, new worries
chapters.description:
Christmas is upon us.

Got 2 new skills. 

Never stopped grinding and added new grind: crafting. 

Started worrying about what to do in summer and where to live.

Used my last free save slot.

Magic Theory ability
Tier 1
Increase in concentration during any use of magic. Helps in casting magic and focusing power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Gestures 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Gestures ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using gestures. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without gestures subconsciously.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Empowering
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 2
Great knowledge of theory allows you to make magic you wield increase or decrease in effect, masterfully controlling amount of magic you channel for it. Degree of change in the amount depends on Magic Theory level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good Player 0/5
abilities.description:
Playing Games ability
Tier 1.
You are good in all games

abilities.name: Crafts Connection
abilities.description:
Crafting ability
Tier 1.
Items crafted have better compatibility with other skills and abilities of the user. Effects applied to it by user are stronger.

abilities.name: Dual Channeling
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 2
You can have 2 active channels of magic, without either of them suffering any loss in power, concentration or amount. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Lady Killer
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 2.
You look better in the eyes of the opposite gender and have higher chance of influencing them. Opposites gender falls in the love with you stronger. Easier to seduce opposite gender. Speech experiences a buff while speaking with opposite gender.

abilities.name: Hidden Attack
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 2.
When hidden and you enemy is not informed of your presence, attacks done to that enemy are tripled in strength.

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making and using potions, transmuting materials and other alchemical transformations.
skills.name: Alchemy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for moving without anyone noticing, hiding presence and dealing damage to enemy while hidden
skills.name: Sneak

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how charming/intimidating you look in the eyes of others, how convincing are your words and how much people trust you.
skills.name: Speech

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how fast you read, how good is your memory and how much you comprehend while studying or learning.
skills.name: Studying

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making wands, using wands and influencing wands.
skills.name: Wand Making

skills.description: Skill is responsible for growing and using magical and normal plants.
skills.name: Herbology

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of magic channel and your control over it.
skills.name: Magic Channeling

skills.description: Skill is responsible for inctantations used to cast magic and how they affect magic.
skills.name: Magic Chanting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for gestures done in the process of magic and how they affect magic channeling.
skills.name: Magic Gesturing

skills.description: Skill is responsible for acquiring and using theoritical part of magic.
skills.name: Magic Theory

skills.description: Skill is responsible for astronomy, celestial bodies and all connected to it magical knowledge.
skills.name: Astronomy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for riding any types of mounts, both living and artificial.
skills.name: Riding Expertise

skills.description: Skill is responsible for items you craft, their effects and quality.
skills.name: Crafting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how good you are at playing games. Type of game does not matter. Effective for all games of every type.
skills.name: Playing Games

spells.name: Fire-Making Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Incendio
Charm
Sets item on fire
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Mending Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

chapters.name: Level 14[p1]. New abilities
chapters.description:
Christmas is upon us.

Got 2 new skills. 

Never stopped grinding and added new grind: crafting. 

Started worrying about what to do in summer and where to live.

Used my last free save slot.

abilities.name: Strong argument 1/4 (25)
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
Your words and sentences hold more weight. People listening to you, with higher probability will trust you. Higher chance to win in verbal arguments.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Weak Presence 0/5
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 1.
Your presence is now harder to notice, and some people would even ignore you completely as if you are not there at all, unless you proactively attract attention to yourself.

abilities.name: Focused mind
abilities.description:
Alchemy ability
Tier 1.
Becomes easier to concentrate and focus your attention during alchemical activities. Harder for external forces to distract you from those activities

abilities.name: Remarkable Comprehension 1/3 (30)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension goes easier and much faster. It helps acquire more knowledge in less time.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Fast Reading 1/2 (65)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
You read books very fast, close to what subvocalization limit is without losing comprehension. 
Note: Comprehension here is not information comprehension, but comprehension of words you’ve read.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better memory 1/3 (45)
abilities.description:

Improves your memory in both memorizing and recalling capabilities.

chapters.name: Level 14[p3]. Did I break the story
chapters.description:
Went to Hagrid's hut and was shocked by absurdity of the situation around the dragon.

Returned to one moment thrice. 

Messed up story and had to fix it by returning.

Improves your memory in both memorizing and recalling capabilities.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better concentration 1/2 (45)
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 1
Increase in concentration during any use of magic. Helps in casting magic and focusing power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Gestures 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Gestures ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using gestures. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without gestures subconsciously.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Empowering
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 2
Great knowledge of theory allows you to make magic you wield increase or decrease in effect, masterfully controlling amount of magic you channel for it. Degree of change in the amount depends on Magic Theory level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good Player 0/5
abilities.description:
Playing Games ability
Tier 1.
You are good in all games

abilities.name: Crafts Connection
abilities.description:
Crafting ability
Tier 1.
Items crafted have better compatibility with other skills and abilities of the user. Effects applied to it by user are stronger. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Dual Channeling
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 2
You can have 2 active channels of magic, without either of them suffering any loss in power, concentration or amount. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Lady Killer
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 2.
You look better in the eyes of the opposite gender and have higher chance of influencing them. Opposites gender falls in the love with you stronger. Easier to seduce opposite gender. Speech experiences a buff while speaking with opposite gender.

abilities.name: Hidden Attack
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 2.
When hidden and you enemy is not informed of your presence, attacks done to that enemy are tripled in strength.

abilities.name: Scaling enchanting
abilities.description:
Enchanting ability
Tier 1.
Strength of enchantment if worn by user will improve in quality. Level of improvement depends on level of enchanting skill.
*Learned*

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making and using potions, transmuting materials and other alchemical transformations.
skills.name: Alchemy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for moving without anyone noticing, hiding presence and dealing damage to enemy while hidden
skills.name: Sneak

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how charming/intimidating you look in the eyes of others, how convincing are your words and how much people trust you.
skills.name: Speech

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how fast you read, how good is your memory and how much you comprehend while studying or learning.
skills.name: Studying

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making wands, using wands and influencing wands.
skills.name: Wand Making

skills.description: Skill is responsible for growing and using magical and normal plants.
skills.name: Herbology

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of magic channel and your control over it.
skills.name: Magic Channeling

skills.description: Skill is responsible for inctantations used to cast magic and how they affect magic.
skills.name: Magic Chanting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for gestures done in the process of magic and how they affect magic channeling.
skills.name: Magic Gesturing

skills.description: Skill is responsible for acquiring and using theoritical part of magic.
skills.name: Magic Theory

skills.description: Skill is responsible for astronomy, celestial bodies and all connected to it magical knowledge.
skills.name: Astronomy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for riding any types of mounts, both living and artificial.
skills.name: Riding Expertise

skills.description: Skill is responsible for items you craft, their effects and quality.
skills.name: Crafting

skills.name: Enchanting

spells.name: Fire-Making Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Incendio
Charm
Sets item on fire
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Mending Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Counter-Curse Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Unknown
Counter leg-lock curse

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

chapters.name: Level 14[p4]. End is near. Let's prepare
chapters.description:
Went to forbidden forest. Everything went smooth without a hitch. 

Learned enchanting and got a crafting ability. Crafted first artifact.

Was knocked out in chess. Finished first year.

abilities.name: Strong argument 1/4 (25)
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
Your words and sentences hold more weight. People listening to you, with higher probability will trust you. Higher chance to win in verbal arguments.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Weak Presence 0/5
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 1.
Your presence is now harder to notice, and some people would even ignore you completely as if you are not there at all, unless you proactively attract attention to yourself.

abilities.name: Focused mind
abilities.description:
Alchemy ability
Tier 1.
Becomes easier to concentrate and focus your attention during alchemical activities. Harder for external forces to distract you from those activities

abilities.name: Remarkable Comprehension 1/3 (30)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension goes easier and much faster. It helps acquire more knowledge in less time.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Fast Reading 1/2 (65)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
You read books very fast, close to what subvocalization limit is without losing comprehension. 
Note: Comprehension here is not information comprehension, but comprehension of words you’ve read.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better memory 1/3 (45)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
Improves your memory in both memorizing and recalling capabilities.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better concentration 1/2 (45)
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 1
Increase in concentration during any use of magic. Helps in casting magic and focusing power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Gestures 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Gestures ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using gestures. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without gestures subconsciously.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Empowering
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 2
Great knowledge of theory allows you to make magic you wield increase or decrease in effect, masterfully controlling amount of magic you channel for it. Degree of change in the amount depends on Magic Theory level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good Player 0/5
abilities.description:
Playing Games ability
Tier 1.
You are good in all games

abilities.name: Crafts Connection
abilities.description:
Crafting ability
Tier 1.
Items crafted have better compatibility with other skills and abilities of the user. Effects applied to it by user are stronger. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Dual Channeling
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 2
You can have 2 active channels of magic, without either of them suffering any loss in power, concentration or amount. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Lady Killer
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 2.
You look better in the eyes of the opposite gender and have higher chance of influencing them. Opposites gender falls in the love with you stronger. Easier to seduce opposite gender. Speech experiences a buff while speaking with opposite gender.

abilities.name: Hidden Attack
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 2.
When hidden and you enemy is not informed of your presence, attacks done to that enemy are tripled in strength.

abilities.name: Scaling enchanting
abilities.description:
Enchanting ability
Tier 1.
Strength of enchantment if worn by user will improve in quality. Level of improvement depends on level of enchanting skill.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good metabolism 1/4 (40)
abilities.description:
Training ability
Tier 1.
Speed up your metabolism without damaging your body. Makes all restorative, digestive, growing and reproductive processes work better.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Agile cook 0/3
abilities.description:
Cooking ability
Tier 1.
Wield cooking tools with more agility and higher speed.

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making and using potions, transmuting materials and other alchemical transformations.
skills.name: Alchemy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for moving without anyone noticing, hiding presence and dealing damage to enemy while hidden
skills.name: Sneak

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how charming/intimidating you look in the eyes of others, how convincing are your words and how much people trust you.
skills.name: Speech

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how fast you read, how good is your memory and how much you comprehend while studying or learning.
skills.name: Studying

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making wands, using wands and influencing wands.
skills.name: Wand Making

skills.description: Skill is responsible for growing and using magical and normal plants.
skills.name: Herbology

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of magic channel and your control over it.
skills.name: Magic Channeling

skills.description: Skill is responsible for inctantations used to cast magic and how they affect magic.
skills.name: Magic Chanting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for gestures done in the process of magic and how they affect magic channeling.
skills.name: Magic Gesturing

skills.description: Skill is responsible for acquiring and using theoritical part of magic.
skills.name: Magic Theory

skills.description: Skill is responsible for astronomy, celestial bodies and all connected to it magical knowledge.
skills.name: Astronomy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for riding any types of mounts, both living and artificial.
skills.name: Riding Expertise

skills.description: Skill is responsible for items you craft, their effects and quality.
skills.name: Crafting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how good you are at playing games. Type of game does not matter. Effective for all games of every type.
skills.name: Playing Games

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of enchantements made by you.
skills.name: Enchanting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how good and fast you cook food and also how delicious is your food.
skills.name: Cooking

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how effective and effecient your physical training, plus has benefits to your body
skills.name: Training

spells.name: Fire-Making Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Incendio
Charm
Sets item on fire
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Mending Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Counter-Curse Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Unknown
Counter leg-lock curse

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

chapters.name: Level 15[p3]. Second, find money.
chapters.description:
Nightmare of the past came as a dream.

Cooked breakfast. 

Helped some damsel in distress.

Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Counter-Curse Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Unknown
Counter leg-lock curse

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

spells.name: Summoning Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Accio
Charm
Summons anyhting he spells(wants) to caster

chapters.name: Level 15[p5]. Legilimens
chapters.description:
Got out and escaped.
Carter and Harper went and found me.

abilities.name: Strong argument 1/4 (25)
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
Your words and sentences hold more weight. People listening to you, with higher probability will trust you. Higher chance to win in verbal arguments.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Weak Presence 0/5
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 1.
Your presence is now harder to notice, and some people would even ignore you completely as if you are not there at all, unless you proactively attract attention to yourself.

abilities.name: Focused mind
abilities.description:
Alchemy ability
Tier 1.
Becomes easier to concentrate and focus your attention during alchemical activities. Harder for external forces to distract you from those activities

abilities.name: Remarkable Comprehension 1/3 (30)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension goes easier and much faster. It helps acquire more knowledge in less time.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Fast Reading 1/2 (65)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
You read books very fast, close to what subvocalization limit is without losing comprehension. 
Note: Comprehension here is not information comprehension, but comprehension of words you’ve read.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better memory 1/3 (45)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
Improves your memory in both memorizing and recalling capabilities.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better concentration 1/2 (45)
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 1
Increase in concentration during any use of magic. Helps in casting magic and focusing power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Gestures 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Gestures ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using gestures. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without gestures subconsciously.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Empowering
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 2
Great knowledge of theory allows you to make magic you wield increase or decrease in effect, masterfully controlling amount of magic you channel for it. Degree of change in the amount depends on Magic Theory level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good Player 0/5
abilities.description:
Playing Games ability
Tier 1.
You are good in all games

abilities.name: Crafts Connection
abilities.description:
Crafting ability
Tier 1.
Items crafted have better compatibility with other skills and abilities of the user. Effects applied to it by user are stronger. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Dual Channeling
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 2
You can have 2 active channels of magic, without either of them suffering any loss in power, concentration or amount. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Lady Killer
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 2.
You look better in the eyes of the opposite gender and have higher chance of influencing them. Opposites gender falls in the love with you stronger. Easier to seduce opposite gender. Speech experiences a buff while speaking with opposite gender.

abilities.name: Hidden Attack
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 2.
When hidden and you enemy is not informed of your presence, attacks done to that enemy are tripled in strength.

abilities.name: Scaling enchanting
abilities.description:
Enchanting ability
Tier 1.
Strength of enchantment if worn by user will improve in quality. Level of improvement depends on level of enchanting skill.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good metabolism 1/4 (40)
abilities.description:
Training ability
Tier 1.
Speed up your metabolism without damaging your body. Makes all restorative, digestive, growing and reproductive processes work better.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Agile cook 0/3
abilities.description:
Cooking ability
Tier 1.
Wield cooking tools with more agility and higher speed.

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making and using potions, transmuting materials and other alchemical transformations.
skills.name: Alchemy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for moving without anyone noticing, hiding presence and dealing damage to enemy while hidden
skills.name: Sneak

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how charming/intimidating you look in the eyes of others, how convincing are your words and how much people trust you.
skills.name: Speech

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how fast you read, how good is your memory and how much you comprehend while studying or learning.
skills.name: Studying

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making wands, using wands and influencing wands.
skills.name: Wand Making

skills.description: Skill is responsible for growing and using magical and normal plants.
skills.name: Herbology

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of magic channel and your control over it.
skills.name: Magic Channeling

skills.description: Skill is responsible for inctantations used to cast magic and how they affect magic.
skills.name: Magic Chanting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for gestures done in the process of magic and how they affect magic channeling.
skills.name: Magic Gesturing

skills.description: Skill is responsible for acquiring and using theoritical part of magic.
skills.name: Magic Theory

skills.description: Skill is responsible for astronomy, celestial bodies and all connected to it magical knowledge.
skills.name: Astronomy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for riding any types of mounts, both living and artificial.
skills.name: Riding Expertise

skills.description: Skill is responsible for items you craft, their effects and quality.
skills.name: Crafting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how good you are at playing games. Type of game does not matter. Effective for all games of every type.
skills.name: Playing Games

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of enchantements made by you.
skills.name: Enchanting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how good and fast you cook food and also how delicious is your food.
skills.name: Cooking

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how effective and effecient your physical training, plus has benefits to your body
skills.name: Training

Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good Player 0/5
abilities.description:
Playing Games ability
Tier 1.
You are good in all games

abilities.name: Crafts Connection
abilities.description:
Crafting ability
Tier 1.
Items crafted have better compatibility with other skills and abilities of the user. Effects applied to it by user are stronger. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Dual Channeling
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 2
You can have 2 active channels of magic, without either of them suffering any loss in power, concentration or amount. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Lady Killer
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 2.
You look better in the eyes of the opposite gender and have higher chance of influencing them. Opposites gender falls in the love with you stronger. Easier to seduce opposite gender. Speech experiences a buff while speaking with opposite gender.

abilities.name: Hidden Attack
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 2.
When hidden and you enemy is not informed of your presence, attacks done to that enemy are tripled in strength.

abilities.name: Scaling enchanting
abilities.description:
Enchanting ability
Tier 1.
Strength of enchantment if worn by user will improve in quality. Level of improvement depends on level of enchanting skill.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good metabolism 1/4 (40)
abilities.description:
Training ability
Tier 1.
Speed up your metabolism without damaging your body. Makes all restorative, digestive, growing and reproductive processes work better.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Agile cook 0/3
abilities.description:
Cooking ability
Tier 1.
Wield cooking tools with more agility and higher speed.

skills.description: Skill is responsible for inctantations used to cast magic and how they affect magic.
skills.name: Magic Chanting

skills.name: Magic Gesturing

skills.description: Skill is responsible for acquiring and using theoritical part of magic.

spells.name: Fire-Making Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Incendio
Charm
Sets item on fire
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Mending Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Counter-Curse Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Unknown
Counter leg-lock curse

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

spells.name: Summoning Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Accio
Charm
Summons anyhting he spells(wants) to caster

Your words and sentences hold more weight. People listening to you, with higher probability will trust you. Higher chance to win in verbal arguments.

abilities.name: Weak Presence 0/5
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 1.
Your presence is now harder to notice, and some people would even ignore you completely as if you are not there at all, unless you proactively attract attention to yourself.

abilities.name: Focused mind
abilities.description:
Alchemy ability
Tier 1.
Becomes easier to concentrate and focus your attention during alchemical activities. Harder for external forces to distract you from those activities

abilities.name: Remarkable Comprehension 1/3 (30)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension goes easier and much faster. It helps acquire more knowledge in less time.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Fast Reading 1/2 (65)
abilities.description:

Tier 2.
You read books very fast, close to what subvocalization limit is without losing comprehension. 
Note: Comprehension here is not information comprehension, but comprehension of words you’ve read.
*Learned*

Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.description:

Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

Counter leg-lock curse

Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

spells.description:
Incantation : Accio
Charm
Summons anyhting he spells(wants) to caster

abilities.name: Strong argument 1/4 (25)
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
Your words and sentences hold more weight. People listening to you, with higher probability will trust you. Higher chance to win in verbal arguments.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Weak Presence 0/5
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 1.
Your presence is now harder to notice, and some people would even ignore you completely as if you are not there at all, unless you proactively attract attention to yourself.

abilities.name: Focused mind
abilities.description:
Alchemy ability
Tier 1.
Becomes easier to concentrate and focus your attention during alchemical activities. Harder for external forces to distract you from those activities

abilities.name: Remarkable Comprehension 1/3 (30)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension goes easier and much faster. It helps acquire more knowledge in less time.
*Upgraded*

abilities.name: Fast Reading 1/2 (65)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
You read books very fast, close to what subvocalization limit is without losing comprehension. 
Note: Comprehension here is not information comprehension, but comprehension of words you’ve read.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better memory 1/3 (45)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
Improves your memory in both memorizing and recalling capabilities.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better concentration 1/2 (45)
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 1
Increase in concentration during any use of magic. Helps in casting magic and focusing power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Gestures 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Gestures ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using gestures. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without gestures subconsciously.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Empowering
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 2
Great knowledge of theory allows you to make magic you wield increase or decrease in effect, masterfully controlling amount of magic you channel for it. Degree of change in the amount depends on Magic Theory level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good Player 0/5
abilities.description:
Playing Games ability
Tier 1.
You are good in all games

abilities.name: Crafts Connection
abilities.description:
Crafting ability
Tier 1.
Items crafted have better compatibility with other skills and abilities of the user. Effects applied to it by user are stronger. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Dual Channeling
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 2
You can have 2 active channels of magic, without either of them suffering any loss in power, concentration or amount. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Lady Killer
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 2.
You look better in the eyes of the opposite gender and have higher chance of influencing them. Opposites gender falls in the love with you stronger. Easier to seduce opposite gender. Speech experiences a buff while speaking with opposite gender.

abilities.name: Hidden Attack
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 2.
When hidden and you enemy is not informed of your presence, attacks done to that enemy are tripled in strength.

abilities.name: Scaling enchanting
abilities.description:
Enchanting ability
Tier 1.
Strength of enchantment if worn by user will improve in quality. Level of improvement depends on level of enchanting skill.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good metabolism 1/4 (40)
abilities.description:
Training ability
Tier 1.
Speed up your metabolism without damaging your body. Makes all restorative, digestive, growing and reproductive processes work better.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Agile cook 0/3
abilities.description:
Cooking ability
Tier 1.
Wield cooking tools with more agility and higher speed.

abilities.name: Unmatched vigor 0/2
abilities.description:
Physical activities ability
Tier 1.
In the process of a physical activity you tire slower.

abilities.name: Unmatched Comprehension 2/3 (60)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension happens with insane speed and effeciency. Easier to understand topic beyond current scope of knowledge. It helps acquire vast amount of knowledge in less time.
*Learned*

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making and using potions, transmuting materials and other alchemical transformations.
skills.name: Alchemy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for moving without anyone noticing, hiding presence and dealing damage to enemy while hidden
skills.name: Sneak

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how charming/intimidating you look in the eyes of others, how convincing are your words and how much people trust you.
skills.name: Speech

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how fast you read, how good is your memory and how much you comprehend while studying or learning.
skills.name: Studying

skills.description: Skill is responsible for making wands, using wands and influencing wands.
skills.name: Wand Making

skills.description: Skill is responsible for growing and using magical and normal plants.
skills.name: Herbology

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of magic channel and your control over it.
skills.name: Magic Channeling

skills.description: Skill is responsible for inctantations used to cast magic and how they affect magic.
skills.name: Magic Chanting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for gestures done in the process of magic and how they affect magic channeling.
skills.name: Magic Gesturing

skills.description: Skill is responsible for acquiring and using theoritical part of magic.
skills.name: Magic Theory

skills.description: Skill is responsible for astronomy, celestial bodies and all connected to it magical knowledge.
skills.name: Astronomy

skills.description: Skill is responsible for riding any types of mounts, both living and artificial.
skills.name: Riding Expertise

skills.description: Skill is responsible for items you craft, their effects and quality.
skills.name: Crafting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how good you are at playing games. Type of game does not matter. Effective for all games of every type.
skills.name: Playing Games

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of enchantements made by you.
skills.name: Enchanting

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how good and fast you cook food and also how delicious is your food.
skills.name: Cooking

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how effective and effecient your physical training, plus has benefits to your body
skills.name: Training

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how effective and effecient your physical activities that do not directly improve your body's conditions
skills.name: Physical Activities

skills.description: Skill is responsible for how effective and effecient your programming skills are.
skills.name: Programming

skills.description: Skill is responsible for dancing.
skills.name: Dancing

spells.name: Fire-Making Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Incendio
Charm
Sets item on fire
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Mending Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Counter-Curse Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Unknown
Counter leg-lock curse

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

spells.name: Summoning Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Accio
Charm
Summons anyhting he spells(wants) to caster

It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using gestures. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without gestures subconsciously.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Empowering
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 2
Great knowledge of theory allows you to make magic you wield increase or decrease in effect, masterfully controlling amount of magic you channel for it. Degree of change in the amount depends on Magic Theory level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good Player 0/5
abilities.description:
Playing Games ability
Tier 1.
You are good in all games

abilities.name: Crafts Connection
abilities.description:
Crafting ability
Tier 1.
Items crafted have better compatibility with other skills and abilities of the user. Effects applied to it by user are stronger. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Dual Channeling
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 2
You can have 2 active channels of magic, without either of them suffering any loss in power, concentration or amount. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Lady Killer
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 2.
You look better in the eyes of the opposite gender and have higher chance of influencing them. Opposites gender falls in the love with you stronger. Easier to seduce opposite gender. Speech experiences a buff while speaking with opposite gender.

abilities.name: Hidden Attack
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 2.
When hidden and you enemy is not informed of your presence, attacks done to that enemy are tripled in strength.

abilities.name: Scaling enchanting
abilities.description:
Enchanting ability
Tier 1.
Strength of enchantment if worn by user will improve in quality. Level of improvement depends on level of enchanting skill.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good metabolism 1/4 (40)
abilities.description:
Training ability
Tier 1.
Speed up your metabolism without damaging your body. Makes all restorative, digestive, growing and reproductive processes work better.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Agile cook 0/3
abilities.description:
Cooking ability
Tier 1.
Wield cooking tools with more agility and higher speed.

abilities.name: Unmatched vigor 0/2
abilities.description:
Physical activities ability
Tier 1.
In the process of a physical activity you tire slower.

abilities.name: Unmatched Comprehension 2/3 (60)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension happens with insane speed and effeciency. Easier to understand topic beyond current scope of knowledge. It helps acquire vast amount of knowledge in less time.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Remarkable argument 2/4 (40)
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
People trust you subconciously. Every simple sentence pronounced by you will now sound more eloquent and strong. High chance to win in verbal arguments.
*Learned*

skills.description: Skill is responsible for power of enchantements made by you.

spells.name: Fire-Making Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Incendio
Charm
Sets item on fire
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Mending Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Counter-Curse Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Unknown
Counter leg-lock curse

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

spells.name: Summoning Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Accio
Charm
Summons anyhting he spells(wants) to caster

skills.description: Skill is responsible for gestures done in the process of magic and how they affect magic channeling.
skills.name: Magic Gesturing

skills.description: Skill is responsible for acquiring and using theoritical part of magic.
skills.name: Magic Theory

skills.description: Skill is responsible for astronomy, celestial bodies and all connected to it magical knowledge.

skills.description: Skill is responsible for riding any types of mounts, both living and artificial.

skills.description: Skill is responsible for items you craft, their effects and quality.

spells.name: Fire-Making Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Incendio
Charm
Sets item on fire
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Mending Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Reparo
Charm
Also known as the Repairing Charm, is a charm that can be used to seamlessly repair a broken object and works on most materials.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Smokescreen Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : Fumos
Charm
Used to create a defensive cloud of smoke from the wand that hinders visibility. This spell is quite useful in duelling, as the smoke hides the caster, preventing an opponent from accurately aiming their spells, as well as allowing the caster to escape unseen.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Severing Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Diffindo
Charm
Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Counter-Curse Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Unknown
Counter leg-lock curse

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

spells.name: Summoning Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Accio
Charm
Summons anyhting he spells(wants) to caster

abilities.name: Strong argument 1/4 (25)
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
Your words and sentences hold more weight. People listening to you, with higher probability will trust you. Higher chance to win in verbal arguments.
*Upgraded*

abilities.name: Weak Presence 0/5
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 1.
Your presence is now harder to notice, and some people would even ignore you completely as if you are not there at all, unless you proactively attract attention to yourself.

abilities.name: Focused mind
abilities.description:
Alchemy ability
Tier 1.
Becomes easier to concentrate and focus your attention during alchemical activities. Harder for external forces to distract you from those activities

abilities.name: Remarkable Comprehension 1/3 (30)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension goes easier and much faster. It helps acquire more knowledge in less time.
*Upgraded*

abilities.name: Fast Reading 1/2 (65)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
You read books very fast, close to what subvocalization limit is without losing comprehension. 
Note: Comprehension here is not information comprehension, but comprehension of words you’ve read.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better memory 1/3 (45)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 2.
Improves your memory in both memorizing and recalling capabilities.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Better concentration 1/2 (45)
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 1
Increase in concentration during any use of magic. Helps in casting magic and focusing power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Gestures 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Gestures ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using gestures. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without gestures subconsciously.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Empowering
abilities.description:
Magic Theory ability
Tier 2
Great knowledge of theory allows you to make magic you wield increase or decrease in effect, masterfully controlling amount of magic you channel for it. Degree of change in the amount depends on Magic Theory level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 1
You can change concentration of magic you channel to make you increase absolute power or slightly change properties(e.g. Concentrate a ray in an arrow). Degree of concentration depends on Magic Channeling level.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Less Chants 1/2 (50)
abilities.description:
Magic Chanting ability
Tier 1
It is easier to learn to use simple magic without using chants. Spells you know well and studied for a long time can be used without chants subconsciously. If you mastered spell and can cast its chantless version, chanting such a spell will increase its power.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good Player 0/5
abilities.description:
Playing Games ability
Tier 1.
You are good in all games

abilities.name: Crafts Connection
abilities.description:
Crafting ability
Tier 1.
Items crafted have better compatibility with other skills and abilities of the user. Effects applied to it by user are stronger. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Dual Channeling
abilities.description:
Magic Channeling ability
Tier 2
You can have 2 active channels of magic, without either of them suffering any loss in power, concentration or amount. 
*Learned*

abilities.name: Lady Killer
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 2.
You look better in the eyes of the opposite gender and have higher chance of influencing them. Opposites gender falls in the love with you stronger. Easier to seduce opposite gender. Speech experiences a buff while speaking with opposite gender.

abilities.name: Hidden Attack
abilities.description:
Sneak ability
Tier 2.
When hidden and you enemy is not informed of your presence, attacks done to that enemy are tripled in strength.

abilities.name: Scaling enchanting
abilities.description:
Enchanting ability
Tier 1.
Strength of enchantment if worn by user will improve in quality. Level of improvement depends on level of enchanting skill.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Good metabolism 1/4 (40)
abilities.description:
Training ability
Tier 1.
Speed up your metabolism without damaging your body. Makes all restorative, digestive, growing and reproductive processes work better.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Agile cook 0/3
abilities.description:
Cooking ability
Tier 1.
Wield cooking tools with more agility and higher speed.

abilities.name: Unmatched vigor 0/2
abilities.description:
Physical activities ability
Tier 1.
In the process of a physical activity you tire slower.

abilities.name: Unmatched Comprehension 2/3 (60)
abilities.description:
Studying ability
Tier 1.
Your digestion of new information and its comprehension happens with insane speed and effeciency. Easier to understand topic beyond current scope of knowledge. It helps acquire vast amount of knowledge in less time.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Remarkable argument 2/4 (40)
abilities.description:
Speech ability
Tier 1.
People trust you subconciously. Every simple sentence pronounced by you will now sound more eloquent and strong. High chance to win in verbal arguments.
*Learned*

abilities.name: Concentrated enchantment
abilities.description:
Enchanting ability
Tier 2.
In the process of enchantment, you do not radiate magic you channel. So, everything channeled will be spent on the enchanting. This will make all enchantments stronger and more long-lasting.
*Learned*

Used to precisely and accurately cut something. It is taught in second year charms classes and Fourth year classes, and if used inappropriately can cause death or injury.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Curse of the Bogies
spells.description:
Incantation : Mucus ad Nauseam
Curse
Curse that gives the recipient a nasty cold and an extremely runny nose that can cause the victim to collapse if it is not treated. The cold is accompanied with constant sneezing. No further casts of this curse have any additional effect on the target, unless the Duo or Tria modifiers are used.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Knockback Jinx
spells.description:
Incantation : Flipendo
Jinx
Jinx that knocks its target backwards. While prominently used for duelling, it can also be used to push heavy objects.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Wand-Lighting Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Lumos
Charm
Illuminates the tip of the caster's wand, allowing the caster to see in the dark. The counter-charm for the spell is the Wand-Extinguishing Charm (Nox), which is used to extinguish the light from the caster's wand.
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Un-Transfiguration Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Charm
Untransfigures items transfigured by other wizards
*Spellbook*

spells.name: Counter-Curse Spell
spells.description:
Incantation : ...
Unknown
Counter leg-lock curse

spells.name: Levitation Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Wingardium Leviosa
Charm
Levitates inanimate objects and small animals.

spells.name: Summoning Charm
spells.description:
Incantation : Accio
Charm
Summons anyhting he spells(wants) to caster
